title: Solo queue - Please remove Parties from Solo Queue
body:
As a solo player, playing with duos absolutely, 100% ruins the game for me.

They do not play on an equal footing, they guard each other and favor each other. They ignore their non duo teammates at vital moments and ruin the entire experience of a solo queue.

Same for trio and quad (quad obviously being the absolute worst).

I don't know why Riot allows this shit. I personally don't care. It just has to go.

If there is an issue where they feel that matchmaking is going to be affected, here is the answer:

1.Add a flag for players who participate in duo games. These are 'soloduos'
2.First try and match a duo and a trio.
3.If that doesn't work match 2 duos together with a 'soloduo'.
4.Allow people to voluntarily enter this god awful duo queue if they want to.
5.Let all solo players play solo.

replies.body:
HELP RITO IS LETTING PEOPLE WITH FRIENDS PLAY WITH EACH OTHER IN COMPETITIVE MODES LIKE EVERY OTHER GAME!!!!!!!

OMGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG
Its not even that. Its the fact that Duo queues wont report each other, dont blame each other, and always think each other is right in everything, which ruins the game.

Why would they report eachother and why would that even matter?
Reports trigger automatic checks for evidence of misconduct, number of reports has absolutely zero effect.

If you want to cry and blame, it is just as effective to do it solo. You like solo, right?

PS: The "unskilled player" report button does not even send any data to the server. It exists to let bad players vent.

No, i play with friends as well. If one is flaming someone on our team i'll tell them to stop and report them if it gets serious. But, lets say im with a quad queue, and one of them is flaming me hard. A lot of the time, the other players will do nothing about it.
It only takes 1 report to flag a game for investigation. It doesn't matter if no one in a 4 man premade reports each other.
Duos in ranked were a thing before dynamic queue. It's nothing new.
